class.name: Ipv4Address
class.description: IPv4 assigned address including information about the subnet it is residing on.

attribute.name: ipv4AddressId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN for IPv4 assigned addresses.

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: IPv4 decimal address + "/" + prefix length<0-32>.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Label for free use.

struct.name: L3EncapsulationUnion
struct.description: Union of all possible IPv4 capable encapsulations .

structMember.name: lagIf
structMember.description: LAG used directly for IP, point-to-point interface type.

enum.name: OperState
enum.description: The operational states of a resource.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is partially or fully operable

enum.name: AdmState
enum.description: The administrative state of a resource.

enumMember.name: LOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively prohibited from performing services for its users.

enumMember.name: UNLOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively permitted to perform services for its users. This is independent of its inherent operability.

enumMember.name: SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: Use of the resource is administratively permitted to existing instances of use only. While the system remains in the shutting down state the manager may at any time cause the managed object to revert to the locked state.

derivedDataType.name: Ipv4Mtu
derivedDataType.description:
IPv4 mtu range is platform specific, thus left uncostrained and will be defined in platform model.
Suggested range : 576-16384

class.name: Ipv4Interface
class.description: IPv4-addressed termination point; interface on an IPv4 routing domain.
class.dependenciesScript: 'unnumbered' can point to an address only within the same routing domain

attribute.name: mtu
attribute.description: Set IPv4 mtu size on this interface.

attribute.name: encapsulation
attribute.description: The underlying encapsulation.

attribute.name: ipv4InterfaceId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN for IPv4 Interface.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: adminState
attribute.description:
Administrative state of L3 interface.
When LOCKED, the connection to the L3 stack is disabled and no L3 packets are received or transmitted or routed through.

attribute.name: operState
attribute.description: Operational state.

attribute.name: ipv6AddressId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN for an IPv6 assigned address.

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: IPv6 address + "/" + prefix length<0-128>.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Label for free use.

mim.author: EUS/ZZT/BHAA Athanasios Kyparlis
mim.name: ECIM_T_L3_Ipv6Interface
mim.description: IPv6-addressed termination point; interface on an IPv6 routing domain.

struct.name: L3EncapsulationUnion
struct.description: Union of all possible IPv4 capable encapsulations .

structMember.name: lagIf
structMember.description: LAG used directly for IP, point-to-point interface type.

enum.name: OperState
enum.description: The operational states of a resource.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is partially or fully operable

enum.name: AdmState
enum.description: The administrative state of a resource.

enumMember.name: LOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively prohibited from performing services for its users.

enumMember.name: UNLOCKED
enumMember.description: The resource is administratively permitted to perform services for its users. This is independent of its inherent operability.

enumMember.name: SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: Use of the resource is administratively permitted to existing instances of use only. While the system remains in the shutting down state the manager may at any time cause the managed object to revert to the locked state.

derivedDataType.name: Ipv6Mtu
derivedDataType.description:
IPv6 mtu range is platform specific, thus left uncostrained and will be defined in platform model.
Suggested range : 1280..65535

class.name: Ipv6Interface
class.description: IPv6-addressed termination point; interface on an IPv6 routing domain.
class.dependenciesScript: An encapsulation can be used by only one interface per address family.

attribute.name: encapsulation
attribute.description: The underlying encapsulation.

attribute.name: mtu
attribute.description: Set IPv6 mtu size.

attribute.name: ipv6InterfaceId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN for IPv6 Interface.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Label for free use.

attribute.name: adminState
attribute.description:
Administrative state of L3 interface.
When LOCKED, the connection to the L3 stack is disabled and no L3 packets are received or transmitted or routed through.

attribute.name: operState
attribute.description: Operational state.

class.name: VRF
class.description:
VRF: L3VPN (rfc4364 - rfc2547bis) capable routing domain.
A VRF is an instance of a routing domain, thus allowing local isolation of routed traffic like a virtual router, but in addition a VRF allows routes and traffic to be communicated with remote VRFs belonging to the same L3VPN.
Reference : RFC4364

attribute.name: vrfId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN for VRF.

attribute.name: routeDistinguisher
attribute.description: Router Distinguisher for injecting VRF routes into the Internet VRF.

attribute.name: ipv4DefaultTTL
attribute.description:
Default TTL value.
The default value inserted into the Time-To-Live field of the IPv4 header of datagrams originated at this entity, whenever a TTL value is not supplied by the transport layer protocol.

attribute.name: ipv6IpDefaultHopLimit
attribute.description:
IPv6 default hop limit.
The default value inserted into the Hop Limit field of the IPv6 header of datagrams originated at this entity whenever a Hop Limit value is not supplied by the transport layer protocol.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: Router
class.description:
A routing domain or VR instance.
It provides data plane isolation of routed traffic and control plane isolation of routing entities from other routing instances.
It allows for further fragmentation of the routing domain.

attribute.name: routerId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN for Router.

attribute.name: ipv4DefaultTTL
attribute.description:
Default TTL value.
The default value inserted into the Time-To-Live field of the IPv4 header of datagrams originated at this entity, whenever a TTL value is not supplied by the transport layer protocol.

attribute.name: ipv6IpDefaultHopLimit
attribute.description:
IPv6 default hop limit.
The default value inserted into the Hop Limit field of the IPv6 header of datagrams originated at this entity whenever a Hop Limit value is not supplied by the transport layer protocol.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: Host
class.description: Representation of an IP domain for traffic termination.

attribute.name: hostId
attribute.description: Value component of the RDN for Host.

attribute.name: ipv4DefaultTTL
attribute.description:
Default TTL value.
The default value inserted into the Time-To-Live field of the IPv4 header of datagrams originated at this entity, whenever a TTL value is not supplied by the transport layer protocol.

attribute.name: ipv6DefaultHopLimit
attribute.description:
IPv6 default hop limit.
The default value inserted into the Hop Limit field of the IPv6 header of datagrams originated at this entity whenever a Hop Limit value is not supplied by the transport layer protocol.

attribute.name: description
attribute.description: Label for free use.
